elements.text: You doctor encouraged you to try some new hobbies, so today you are attending a crafting workshop. You begin to have trouble handling the tools due to your PD symptoms. You ask for assistance from the instructor and the craft is...

elements.name: Crafting Workshop_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
